item.description:
Explore woods and fields by the light of the January Ice Moon.

After party @ The Farm Bar & Grille -25A Portland Ave. Dover, NH!

Try out those new snowshoes on a clear and crisp winter’s evening. We'll explore Kingman Farm's extensive network of trails by moonlight and of course we'll go for food and drinks afterward!

Bring a headlamp (or flashlight). You can also bring glow sticks or reflective tape to look spooky in the dark.

The pace will be leisurely to brisk - a snowshoe walk not run. Time and distance will depend on the group but figure on no more than a couple of hours. Let me know if you need snowshoes. I have a couple of extra pairs.

Weather: If there's no snow, we can still walk! Only rain will cancel and I will email & post on this site if it looks like rain.

No pets, please.

Moonrise: 3:03pm  Sunset: 4:22pm - The waxing moon will be almost full.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: The Original Moonlight Snowshoe/Hike
